dict.string: We need camera access to take profile pictures.
We need photo library access to select profile pictures.
We need your location to show you and your partner on the map.
We need your location to keep you connected with your partner even when the app is in the background.
We need your location to keep you connected with your partner even when the app is in the background.
We use health data to track your activities and provide better location tracking.
We use health data to track your activities and provide better location tracking.
We use Bluetooth to improve location accuracy and detect when your partner is nearby.
We use Bluetooth to improve location accuracy and detect when your partner is nearby.
We use motion data to improve location accuracy and activity detection.
We use nearby interaction to detect when your partner is close by.
We'll notify you about your partner's location updates and important events.
We use weather data to provide weather information along your tracking route.
